title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You know how to spot a victory today, no matter how unconventional it might seem. For example, not losing so much as an inch of footing on a slippery slope is a big success. Tying the score precisely as the buzzer sounds can be a huge win. Taking the most positive view of every development is like a superpower today. Fortunately, your optimistic outlook is a major source of empowerment. And theres no denying how delicious it is to savor your winning edge. Frank Tyger wrote, Ambition is enthusiasm with a purpose. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
